original_text:
Book of Ra Deluxe 10
Piramidi, antichi tesori nascosti dietro indecifrabili misteri, divinità potenti e un labile confine fra quello dei vivi e quello dei morti. Queste sono solo alcune delle caratteristiche dell’Antico Egitto, una delle ambientazioni maggiormente amate nel mondo delle slot online.
Book of Ra Deluxe 10 della Novomatic fa parte di una fortunata serie di slot, una fra le più amate sull’Antico Egitto e che ci porterà a scoprire ricchezze nascoste fra le sabbie del deserto. Iniziamo, quindi, la nostra recensione di Book of Ra Deluxe 10 dal suo comparto sia visivo che sonoro.

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 – Grafica
Sullo sfondo di quella che sembra una ricostruzione di un antico palazzo egizio, colorato dalla luce rossa e calda del tramonto, troviamo la griglia di gioco di Book of Ra Deluxe 10. O per meglio dire: le griglie.
Infatti avremo ben due griglie di gioco che ricordano delle antiche lastre di pietra con scolpiti sopra dei geroglifici e decorate di rosso e blu. I simboli della slot sono, in realtà, piuttosto comuni con la serie di Book of Ra della Novomatic. Oltre a quelli più tradizionali delle carte da gioco (A, K, Q, J e 10) che sono iniziali e numeri in un font che ricorda i geroglifici, se ne trovano altri legati all’ambientazione della slot come la testa del sarcofago d’oro di Tutankhamon, la statua alata della dea Iside, la moneta con la dea-gatta Bastet, lo scarabeo blu e il libro di Ra. Ma oltre a queste c’è anche l’immancabile protagonista della slot: l’avventuriero sorridente che ricorda molto il ben più famoso archeologo con il fedora del cinema.
Book of Ra Deluxe 10 è una slot visivamente molto apprezzabile e curata ma che non sembra discostarsi troppo dagli altri titoli della stessa serie.
Passiamo, quindi, al gameplay della slot.

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 – 80 Simboli a ogni giocata
Basta uno sguardo a questa slot per capire che il suo meccanismo di gioco è completamente diverso rispetto alla maggior parte dei titoli che possono essere trovati online.
Davanti a noi troviamo due griglie di gioco: quella a sinistra utilizza uno schema di tipo 5*4, con cinque rulli e quattro linee lungo le quali si dispongono i venti simboli a ogni turno.
A destra si trova una specie di estensione dei cinque rulli di cui abbiamo appena parlato, i quali vengono accompagnati da ben dodici linee di simboli, mostrandone così sessanta a ogni giocata.
Queste due griglie non sono completamente separate tra di loro: tanto per fare un esempio, il simbolo Wild della moneta può espandersi sull’intero rullo di entrambe le griglie. In un attimo potremmo così ritrovarci con decine di simboli Wild e relative potenziali combinazioni.
È bello vedere come, sebbene sfruttando la stessa tematica e illustrazioni, per una volta la saga di Book of Ra si sia mossa in una direzione diversa dal solito.

Slot simili a Book of Ra Deluxe 10
Inutile dire che le slot a tema Antico Egitto non mancano mai. Alcuni esempi di slot molto interessanti sono: Pyramid Quest of Immortality, Rich Wilde and The Book of the Dead, Pyramid Treasure ed Egyptian Heroes.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Ra Deluxe 10
Pyramids, ancient treasures hidden behind indecipherable mysteries, powerful deities, and a thin line between the world of the living and the world of the dead. These are just some of the features of Ancient Egypt, one of the most beloved themes in the world of online slots. 

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 by Novomatic is part of a successful series of slots, one of the most beloved on Ancient Egypt that will lead us to discover hidden riches in the sands of the desert. Let's start our review of Book of Ra Deluxe 10 from its visual and sound aspects.

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 - Graphics
On the background of what seems like a reconstruction of an ancient Egyptian palace, colored by the warm red light of sunset, we find Book of Ra Deluxe 10's game grid. Or, more precisely, the grids. In fact, we will have two game grids that resemble ancient stone slabs with hieroglyphics and are decorated in red and blue. The slot symbols are, in fact, rather common in the Book of Ra series of Novomatic. In addition to the more traditional playing cards (A, K, Q, J, and 10) that are initials and numbers in a font that resembles hieroglyphics, there are others related to the slot theme such as the gold sarcophagus head of Tutankhamon, the winged statue of the goddess Isis, the goddess-cat Bastet coin, the blue scarab, and the Book of Ra. But in addition to these, there is also the inevitable protagonist of the slot: the smiling adventurer that looks a lot like the much more famous archaeologist with the fedora from the movies. Book of Ra Deluxe 10 is a visually appealing and well-crafted slot that does not seem to differ much from the other titles in the same series. 

Let's move on to the slot's gameplay.

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 - 80 Symbols on Each Spin
A simple glance at this slot is enough to understand that its gameplay mechanism is completely different from most of the titles that can be found online. In front of us, we find two game grids: the one on the left uses a 5*4 type scheme, with five reels and four lines along which twenty symbols are arranged on each spin. On the right, there is a kind of extension of the five reels we just talked about, which are accompanied by twelve lines of symbols, thus showing sixty on each spin.
These two grids are not completely separate from each other: as an example, the Wild symbol of the coin can expand to the entire reel of both grids. In an instant, we could find ourselves with dozens of Wild symbols and potential combinations. It's nice to see how, while using the same theme and illustrations, for once the Book of Ra saga has moved in a different direction than usual.

Slots Similar to Book of Ra Deluxe 10
Needless to say, Ancient Egyptian themed slots are always popular. Some examples of very interesting slots are: Pyramid Quest of Immortality, Rich Wilde and The Book of the Dead, Pyramid Treasure, and Egyptian Heroes.

Game Overview

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 by Novomatic is an online slot game that is part of a successful series of slots centered on Ancient Egypt. The slot game has two game grids that resemble ancient stone slabs carved with hieroglyphs and decorated with red and blue.

Symbols and Theme

The symbols in Book of Ra Deluxe 10 include playing card symbols such as A, K, Q, J, and 10, which are initials and numbers in a font reminiscent of hieroglyphs. Other symbols related to the slot's setting include the head of Tutankhamun's gold sarcophagus, the winged statue of the goddess Isis, the coin with the cat-goddess Bastet, the blue scarab, and the Book of Ra. The background of the game is a reconstruction of an ancient Egyptian palace, colored by the red and warm light of the sunset. The game grids are not entirely separate, and Wild symbols can expand on both grids.

Similar Games

There are many slots centered on Ancient Egypt, such as Pyramid Quest of Immortality, Rich Wilde and The Book of the Dead, Pyramid Treasure, and Egyptian Heroes.

Overall Impression

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 is a well-crafted online slot game that differs from the other titles in the same Book of Ra series due to its unique gameplay mechanism with two game grids. Pyramids, ancient treasures hidden behind indecipherable mysteries, powerful gods and a tenuous border between the world of the living and the world of the dead. These are just some of the features of Ancient Egypt, one of the most beloved themes in the world of online slots.
Book of Ra Deluxe 10 by Novomatic is part of a successful series of slots, one of the most beloved on Ancient Egypt, which will lead us to discover hidden riches among the sands of the desert. Let's start our review of Book of Ra Deluxe 10 with its visual and sound aspects.

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 – Graphics
On the background of what seems to be a reconstruction of an ancient Egyptian palace, colored by the red and warm light of the sunset, we find the game grid of Book of Ra Deluxe 10. Or rather: the grids.
In fact, we will have two game grids that resemble ancient stone slabs carved with hieroglyphs and decorated with red and blue. The symbols of the slot are actually quite common with the Book of Ra series by Novomatic. In addition to the more traditional playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J, and 10) which are initials and numbers in a font reminiscent of hieroglyphs, there are others related to the slot's setting such as the head of Tutankhamun's gold sarcophagus, the winged statue of the goddess Isis, the coin with the cat-goddess Bastet, the blue scarab, and the Book of Ra. But in addition to these, there is also the inevitable protagonist of the slot: the smiling adventurer who looks a lot like the more famous archaeologist with the fedora from the movies.
Book of Ra Deluxe 10 is a visually pleasing and well-crafted slot, but it doesn't seem to deviate too much from the other titles in the same series.
So, let's move on to the gameplay of the slot.

Book of Ra Deluxe 10 – 80 Symbols per Spin
Just one glance at this slot is enough to understand that its gameplay mechanism is completely different from the majority of titles that can be found online.
In front of us, we find two game grids: the one on the left uses a 5x4 type schema, with five reels and four lines along which the twenty symbols are arranged on each turn.
On the right is a sort of extension of the five reels we just talked about, which are accompanied by no less than twelve lines of symbols, showing sixty symbols on each spin.
These two grids are not completely separate from each other: just to give an example, the Wild symbol of the coin can expand on the entire reel of both grids. In no time at all, we could find ourselves with dozens of Wild symbols and their potential combinations.
It's nice to see how, although it uses the same theme and illustrations, for once the saga of Book of Ra has moved in a different direction from the usual.
